availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Columbus Columbus Scales (Kenton County, Kentucky, student and notary public)

body.p: Kenton County, Kentucky, student and notary public. Kentucky native. Son of Joab Scales and Cornelia J. Scales. Attended Centre College in Boyle County, Kentucky, from 1861 to 1862. Student in Kenton County, Kentucky, in 1850. Student in Kenton County in 1860. Notary public in Kenton County in 1862.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Kenton County, Covington Ward 3, p. 248A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Kenton County, Covington, District 4, p. 703.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Kenton County, Covington, District 4, p. 28A.
Kentucky Death Certificates, 1911-1965, Kentucky Office of Vital Statistics, KDLA, Frankfort, KY, File 2173.
Twenty-Seventh Annual Catalogue of the Officers and Students of Centre College, 1861, (Frankfort: A.G. Hodges & Co., 1861).
KYR-0001-017-0292.
